{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine which statement about N. gonorrhoea is false, we need to review the information provided in the relevant documents. Document [0] states that genes exist within N. gonorrhoeae that confer resistance to every single antibiotic used to cure gonorrhea, indicating that not all strains are highly susceptible to penicillin. Therefore, statement B is false. Statement A is true, as N. gonorrhoea is a common cause of urethritis in males. Statement C is also true, as N. gonorrhoea can cause disseminated gonococcal infection. Statement D is true, as N. gonorrhoea is found exclusively in human beings. Therefore, the false statement is B.", "answer_choice": "B"}
